import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{Card,Button,Container,Row,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Home=()=>{const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchRecipes=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("https://foodgram-xap1.onrender.com/recipes");setRecipes(response.data);}catch(err){console.log(err);}};fetchRecipes();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"mb-4 text-center animate__animated animate__fadeInDown",children:"\uD83D\uDD25 Explore Delicious Recipes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"g-4 justify-content-center",children:[" ",recipes.filter(recipe=>recipe.name!=="sdklnfl"&&recipe.imageUrl)// ðŸ”¥ Removes "sdklnfl"
.map((recipe,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:12,sm:6,md:4,className:"d-flex justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"mb-4 animate__animated animate__fadeInUp",style:{animationDelay:`${index*0.1}s`,width:"22rem"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:recipe.imageUrl,className:"card-img-top",alt:recipe.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:recipe.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:recipe.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",children:"View Recipe"})]})]})},recipe._id))]})]});};
